Texts.Chs: 使用抓钩、绳索、采矿工具、一次性光源或手电筒时，其基本攻击力增加至110%
Texts.Eng: 110% Base Power while using Grappling Hooks, Rope, Mining Tools, Throwable Light Sources, or Flashlights.

Texts.Chs: 升级版的二段跳，按住[W]向前滑行，会慢慢失去高度。你可以在滑行时使用二段跳。滑翔能量消耗随敏捷值的提高而降低。
Texts.Eng: An upgrade to Double Jump, hold [W] to glide forward, slowly losing altitude. You can use your double jump while gliding. Glide energy cost decreases with higher Agility.

Texts.Chs: 升级版的滑翔。可以做三次额外的空中跳和一次墙壁跳。空中跳的效果是85%。你贴着墙壁的时间可以比正常的时间稍长，跳跃和下滑速度也较慢。滑翔能量消耗随敏捷值的提高而降低。
Texts.Eng: An upgrade to Glide. Gain another three midair jumps and a wall jump. Midair jumps are 85% as effective. You cling to walls slightly longer than the normal Wall Jump and slide down slower as well. Glide energy cost decreases with higher Agility.

Texts.Chs: 按[G]（在按键设置中绑定[G]）可在增强型空中冲刺和增强型冲刺之间切换。增强型空中冲刺比普通的得更远，冷却时间更短。增强型冲刺比冲刺更快，耗能更低。
Texts.Eng: Press [G] (Bind [G] in your Controls) to switch between Enhanced Airdash and Enhanced Sprint. Enhanced Airdash travels further than Air Dash, and has a shorter cooldown. Enhanced Sprint is faster and costs less energy than Sprint.

Texts.Chs: 按[H]键（在按键设置中绑定[H]键）变形为可跳跃的快速荆刺球。按[F]消耗能量以难以置信的速度向下钻。不论是否变形都可以向下钻。
Texts.Eng: Press [H] (Bind [H] in your Controls) to transform into a fast Spike Sphere that can jump. Press [F] to drill down at incredible speed, draining your energy. You can drill whether or not you are transformed.

Texts.Chs: 当生命值超过一半时，提供明亮的黄色光芒。
Texts.Eng: While Health is greater than half, provide a bright yellow Glow.
